item.title: The Case Against Young Link
item.author: hayden.macdonald.8778@gmail.com (Hayden MacDonald)
item.description: Melee Here I will elaborate about Melee. Imagine how many Young Link comments that would show up if I showed this yesterday (Hbox's 2017 char data) pic.twitter.com/ZjT8tDy1QO — CLG Tafo (@tafokints) November 7, 2017 Set-Up library(dplyr) library(tidyr) library(ggplot2) library(RColorBrewer) library(MASS) Arranging Data Hbox <- read.csv(file = "Hbox2017.csv", sep = ",", header = TRUE) Hbox <- arrange(Hbox, desc(Win.Percent)) Hbox ## OpponentCharacter Wins Losses Total Win.Percent ## 1 Marth 7 1 8 87.
